def_cn: （因遭人怠慢而感到的）恼怒，愠怒
def_en: Pique is the feeling of annoyance you have when you think someone has not treated you properly.

def_cn: 激起，引起（兴趣或好奇心）
def_en: If something piques your interest or curiosity, it makes you interested or curious.
If someone does something in a fit of pique, they do it suddenly because they are annoyed at being not treated properly.
